mapper.update: update diary set del_yn = 'y' where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT dc.seq AS commentSeq, dc.userNickname AS commentUserNickname, dc.content AS commentContent, dc.create_date AS commentCreateDate, d.seq AS diarySeq FROM diaryCMT dc JOIN diary d ON dc.diarySeq = d.seq WHERE d.userNickname = #{userNickname} ORDER BY dc.seq DESC
select * , DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS cmtDate From diaryCMT where diarySeq = #{seq} order by seq desc
